person.name: Dieter Legat
person.bio: More than 50 years experience as business manager in I.T. (AEG-Telefunken, Honeywell, Hewlett-Packard) and top management consultant - with special expertise in operational business leadership. Coach in operational management fell in love with Threefold.
person.excerpt: More than 50 years experience as business manager in I.T. (AEG-Telefunken, Honeywell, Hewlett-Packard).
